text: Virgin Airlines may refer to: Active airlines: *Virgin Atlantic *Virgin Australia Defunct airlines: *V Australia (Rebranded to Virgin Australia with Virgin Blue & Virgin Polynesia) *Virgin Nigeria (Rebranded to Air Nigeria) *Virgin Express (Rebranded to Brussels Airlines) **Virgin Express France *Virgin Sun (sold and merged into Air 2000) *Virgin Atlantic Little Red *Virgin Samoa *Virgin America (sold and merged into Alaska Airlines) ==See also== *Virgin Group *Virgin Galactic *Virgin Balloon Flights
title: Virgin Airlines
